longBusinessSummary: Marvel Discovery Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for uranium, rare earth metals, battery metals, and gold deposits. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Duhamel Property consists of nine mineral claims located northwest of the city of the Saguenay, Quebec; the Wicheeda North project comprises four claims that covers 4,423.8 hectares situated Northeast of Prince George, British Columbia; and the Blackfly property that includes five claims consisting of 64 unpatented mining claims located in Atikokan, Ontario. It also holds interest in the Victoria Lake comprises five claims with 55 claim units located in Newfoundland; the East Bull property, which includes 16 mineral claims situated in the Deagle, Gaiashk, and Gerow mining district, Ontario; and the Sandy Pond and Baie Verte Line property comprising 335 mineral claims located in the Province of Newfoundland and Labrador. In addition, the company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Highway Property located in the Saskatchewan. The company was formerly known as International Montoro Resources Inc. Marvel Discovery Corp. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Brian Lorne Crawford B. Com., B.Com., C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
companyOfficers.title: Chief Financial Officer
